prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Bass, Chromatic Percussion, Drums, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Guitar, Bass, Chromatic Percussion, and Drums, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
Guitar, Bass, Chromatic Percussion, and Drums are all present in this song, but Piano is not included.

Style 3:
This song is composed of Guitar, Bass, Chromatic Percussion, and Drums, Piano being the only instrument not included.
